document.full_text: two massachusetts towns are moving to ban sales of a "relaxation" brownie named lazy cakes, laced with melatonin and sold in food markets, after children who ate them required hospitalization.
document.title: massachusetts riled up over "relaxation" brownie
lines_and_colors: two massachusetts towns are moving to ban sales of a "relaxation" brownie named lazy cakes, laced with melatonin and sold in food markets, after children who ate them required hospitalization.
